title: Someone is using my LoL account and playing games on it.
body: I would love it if anybody could help me with this issue because I have spent a good amount of money and played a ton on the account and I don't want anybody ruining it. If anybody could help me I would be extremely thankful.

replies.body:
Change your password,
Update your email,
Update recovery questions.
He changed the email to his own

I'd suggest you get in touch with the support team directly about this, and they should be able to help you out.

(Click the "Support" link at the top of the page, and then "Submit a Request" on the next page).

Cheers
Mindstar
